problem:
Require Import Coq.Setoids.Setoid.
 Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
 Require Import Coq.micromega.Psatz.
 Local Open Scope Z.
  Definition square (x: Z): Z := x * x.
  Definition shift_up1 (f: Z -> Z) (x: Z): Z :=   f x + 1.
  Example shift_up1_square: forall x,   shift_up1 square x = x * x + 1. 
(**********)
(** Fill in your proof here*)
(**********)
proof: Proof. unfold shift_up1, square. lia. Qed.
